Name: Alabazam (long)
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Review: This long, fruity cocktail packs a cognac-charged punch, but as the ice melts, it mellows and becomes refreshing.
History: The first known reference to a cocktail of this name appears in Leo-Engel's 1878 American Other Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Alabazam (long) contains 209 calories
